Hello,

I worked it out. You need to define a static method:
public static TestSuite suite() {
    return new MyTestSuite();
}
in the test case. It is not enough to just extend TestSuite, as many 
of the tools do not use the extended TestSuite but instantiate their 
own.

Cheers
